meanings.definition: The fruiting body of an ascomycete fungus, containing its spore-bearing structures.
meanings.sent1: The ascocarp releases spores to reproduce.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ascocarp to learn more about fungi.
meanings.sent3: The ascocarp decided to throw a spore party for all its friends.
meanings.sent4: The ascocarp stood tall like a spore-filled tower in the forest.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the ascocarp looked like a tiny spore city.

meanings.definition: A structure in certain lichens that contains the reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The ascocarp of the lichen holds the reproductive parts.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often admire the beauty of the ascocarp in lichens.
meanings.sent3: The ascocarp in the lichen told jokes to the other structures.
meanings.sent4: The ascocarp in the lichen was like a secret garden of reproduction.
meanings.sent5: In the sunlight, the ascocarp of the lichen gleamed with life.
